resourcepack.emendatusenigmatica.title: EE: Generated Resource Pack
resourcepack.emendatusenigmatica.desc: Used by EE to provide textures for blocks and items.
screen.emendatusenigmatica.config.title: Emendatus Enigmatica Configuration
screen.emendatusenigmatica.config.client: When enabled, renders the Token of Appreciation above heads of the EE Patreons.
When enabled, returns to the old strength of Glint on armor.
screen.emendatusenigmatica.config.valida: Log warnings and errors from Data Validation
When enabled, logs warnings and errors returned from the data validation. Has only effect on boot.
